alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:36AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern West Feliciana, southeastern West Baton Rouge, St. Helena, northwestern Livingston, East Feliciana, northeastern Iberville, west central Tangipahoa and East Baton Rouge Parishes, Wilkinson and western Amite Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 736 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Adams to 6 miles southwest of Jackson to near Plaquemine. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Jackson, Clinton, Liberty, Greensburg, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Amite City, Brusly, Livingston, Centreville, Independence, Woodville and Slaughter. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 151 and 166. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 20. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 39 and 48. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
